title: Immediate Threat Detected
body: We found 37 viruses. Download ‘QuickFix’ to clean now. (Timer: 2:59)

choices.label: Download QuickFix
choices.feedback: Risky choice. Timers and scary numbers are tricks to rush you. The app could be spyware.

choices.label: Close this pop-up
choices.feedback: Good job. Close the tab/pop-up. Run your trusted antivirus (from the official store) and scan your device.
